analysis.description:
EGRCrowdsale.executeTransfer (/unique_chucks/46/0x3c7c6cad6ed499fc96e66d6b616a4c14de99a6e9.sol#351-374) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- require(bool)(transferProposal.engravedAddress.send(this.balance)) (/unique_chucks/46/0x3c7c6cad6ed499fc96e66d6b616a4c14de99a6e9.sol#369-372)

EGRCrowdsale.executeTransfer (/unique_chucks/46/0x3c7c6cad6ed499fc96e66d6b616a4c14de99a6e9.sol#351-374) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool)(EGREngravedToken.owner() == transferProposal.engravedAddress)

Reentrancy in EGRCrowdsale.claim (/unique_chucks/46/0x3c7c6cad6ed499fc96e66d6b616a4c14de99a6e9.sol#249-269):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(EGREngravedToken.issue(msg.sender,rateAirDrop * 10 ** 3)) (/unique_chucks/46/0x3c7c6cad6ed499fc96e66d6b616a4c14de99a6e9.sol#262-263)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- airdropParticipants (/unique_chucks/46/0x3c7c6cad6ed499fc96e66d6b616a4c14de99a6e9.sol#269)
	- participatedInAirdrop (/unique_chucks/46/0x3c7c6cad6ed499fc96e66d6b616a4c14de99a6e9.sol#265-268)

Reentrancy in EGRCrowdsale.vote (/unique_chucks/46/0x3c7c6cad6ed499fc96e66d6b616a4c14de99a6e9.sol#325-344):
	External calls:
	- weight = EGREngravedToken.balanceOf(msg.sender) (/unique_chucks/46/0x3c7c6cad6ed499fc96e66d6b616a4c14de99a6e9.sol#337-339)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- transferProposal (/unique_chucks/46/0x3c7c6cad6ed499fc96e66d6b616a4c14de99a6e9.sol#339-340)
	- transferProposal (/unique_chucks/46/0x3c7c6cad6ed499fc96e66d6b616a4c14de99a6e9.sol#342)

Reentrancy in EGRCrowdsale.executeTransfer (/unique_chucks/46/0x3c7c6cad6ed499fc96e66d6b616a4c14de99a6e9.sol#351-374):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(EGREngravedToken.unlock()) (/unique_chucks/46/0x3c7c6cad6ed499fc96e66d6b616a4c14de99a6e9.sol#356-361)
	- require(bool)(EGREngravedToken.startIncentiveDistribution()) (/unique_chucks/46/0x3c7c6cad6ed499fc96e66d6b616a4c14de99a6e9.sol#361-362)
	- EGREngravedToken.transferOwnership(transferProposal.engravedAddress) (/unique_chucks/46/0x3c7c6cad6ed499fc96e66d6b616a4c14de99a6e9.sol#363-365)
	- require(bool)(EGREngravedToken.owner() == transferProposal.engravedAddress) (/unique_chucks/46/0x3c7c6cad6ed499fc96e66d6b616a4c14de99a6e9.sol#365-369)
	External calls sending eth:
	- require(bool)(transferProposal.engravedAddress.send(this.balance)) (/unique_chucks/46/0x3c7c6cad6ed499fc96e66d6b616a4c14de99a6e9.sol#369-372)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- stage (/unique_chucks/46/0x3c7c6cad6ed499fc96e66d6b616a4c14de99a6e9.sol#372-374)

Reentrancy in EGRCrowdsale.fallback (/unique_chucks/46/0x3c7c6cad6ed499fc96e66d6b616a4c14de99a6e9.sol#377-384):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)((EGREngravedToken.totalSupply() + valueInEGR) <= (maxSupply * 10 ** 3)) (/unique_chucks/46/0x3c7c6cad6ed499fc96e66d6b616a4c14de99a6e9.sol)
	- require(bool)(EGREngravedToken.issue(msg.sender,valueInEGR)) (/unique_chucks/46/0x3c7c6cad6ed499fc96e66d6b616a4c14de99a6e9.sol)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- balances (/unique_chucks/46/0x3c7c6cad6ed499fc96e66d6b616a4c14de99a6e9.sol)
	- raised (/unique_chucks/46/0x3c7c6cad6ed499fc96e66d6b616a4c14de99a6e9.sol)
